attrs.label: 1Password Credentials (Base64)
attrs.description:
The Base64 encoded content of the 1password-credentials.json file.</br>
You can generate the Base64 encoded content of the file with the following command:</br>
`cat 1password-credentials.json | base64 | tr '/+' '_-' | tr -d '=' | tr -d '\n'`

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access
